summary: 3 different rooms for taking screenshots of your character, completely lore-friendly
descriptionHtml:
I always had trouble finding the ideal place to take screenshots of my character, armour, weapons etc. So I made a custom studio to make it all easier. This is ideal for mod reviewers/ screenshooters or anyone wanting to take a good look at their character and take a few pics.
The first room is a small empty room with decorations, I made this room mainly for armour and weapon mods to take a good look at them, and take some screenshots.
The second room is made for screenshots with my character and their companion with props suitable for two actors, such as a dining table and bed.
The third room is mainly for taking screenshots of just my character with some props around the go with some of the poses.
All of the rooms are connected by a hall that can be accessed in Solitude.
author: Xinuin
